subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Kristin's Files/I THANK YOU FOR TALKING.mp3 
  Uploaded by : nitsirk65 <ckmorris95@...> 
  Description : EVPMaker with Allophones I THANK YOU FOR TALKING

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Kristin%27s%20Files/I%20THANK%20YOU%20FOR%20TALKING.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:

Regards,
